: : Hollywood/Sting : :

Sting leaves and goes into a CR Chamber, and gets =
ready for a new paint job.  

Hollywood:  I already had that done in my rep=
aint, brother!

He starts to walk around.  He was the only one who had a ne=
w paint job, so he would be by himself, for a little bit.  

Hollywood:  Sa=
lvaging time.

He opens the doors and lowers the shields and exits the base=
.  He goes inside the ship that Diesel, Arrow, Deemos and Sting took to get=
 to Earth.

Hollywood:  Hmm, nice stuff.  Hey, whaddayaknow, brother!

He w=
alks over to a large control board, with computer screens built into it.  I=
n a special slot, there is already a disk in it.  Hollywood checks the cont=
ents of the disk.  It was a brand new system upgrade, according to the date=
.  Hollywood stored it in subspace, he could use it to upload the contents =
to the nWo's data and give them an upgrade.  Hollywood had brought some spa=
re disks with him, in case he needed to save anything.  On one screen, was =
a map and other info of the present Earth, from Sting's scan.  He saved it =
on disk, to upload to the nWo's databanks.  Hollywood continued to check al=
l the computers, and he stored all the information kept on them.  Soon, it =
would be time to self-destruct the ship in order to scatter parts.

-------=
---------------------------------------------------------------------------=
----
The preceding announcement has been paid for by the 
New World Order

=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogro=
ups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 8:28 PM
  Subject: Re: Secret Mess=
ages


  : : Razor / Diesel : :

  Razor laughs at Hollywood's comment. He =
then turns to Arrow. 

  Razor: Branding is for our enemies. Go into the CR=
 chamber. The logo can be put on with a sleek paint job!

  He motions for =
the others to do the same. He then sets the automatic cotroles.

  Diesel a=
nd Razor both get into the CR's.

  ***************************************=
******************
  The preceding has been paid for by the
  New World Ord=
er



    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Hollywood Narrator 
    T=
o: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 8:12 PM
    Su=
bject: Re: Secret Messages


    Arrow: Do me first. Right across the chest=
.

    He steps up and motions to be branded with the logo of the N...W...O=
...

      ----- Original Message -----
      From: RoboRick007
      To: n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com
      Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 7:03 PM
      Sub=
ject: Re: Secret Messages


      : : Razor : :

      Razor grabs a chunk =
of rick from the ground and crushes it in his metal hand.

      Razor: Yes=
ssssssssssssssssssss!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

      ********************************=
***********************************
      The preceding has been paid for b=
y the
      New World Order
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        F=
rom: LurkerAbyss 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Friday,=
 August 16, 2002 6:55 PM
        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


        : :=
 Sting/Hollywood : :

        Hollywood thinks about his Autobot past.

   =
     Hollywood:  Damn Maximals got what they deserved, brother!

        St=
ing:   They were shattered mercilessly by our awesome power.

        Sting=
 looks at the logo.

        Sting:  Indeed, our enemies shall be crushed b=
eneath our iron fist, and die knowing that their fate was decided by the Ne=
w World Order!...

        ------------------------------------------------=
--------------------------------------
        The preceding announcement h=
as been paid for by the 
        New World Order
          ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
          From: RoboRick007 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com 
          Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 6:41 PM
          Subject: Re=
: Secret Messages


          : : Razor / Diesel ::

          Diesel: The =
Maximals tried to defend it, but the hanger and the Maximals themselves wer=
e left in ruin.

          Razor had a wicked smile at this.

          Raz=
or: Ha ha. Stupid Maximals. You guys our great. Anyway a little bit of buis=
ness. 

          Razor brings up the nWo logo on the computer screen.

   =
       Razor: We should all have this logo on us. I want our enemies who kn=
ow who destroys them!

          ******************************************=
*************************
          The preceding announcement has been pai=
d for by the
          New World Order
            ----- Original Message -=
---- 
            From: LurkerAbyss 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com=
 
            Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 6:34 PM
            Subject: Re=
: Secret Messages


            : : Sting/Hollywood : :

            Hollyw=
ood grins.

            Hollywood:  It's good to have you all here, brother=
s!

            He nods at Razor.

            Hollywood:  We could use tho=
se parts.  Say, brother, that looks like a pretty high-tech ship.

        =
    Sting:  Yeah, we pirated it from some Maximals.  At least, I think they=
 owned it.

            ---------------------------------------------------=
-----------------------------------
            The preceding announcement =
has been paid for by the 
            New World Order

        Yahoo! Group=
s Sponsor 
              ADVERTISEMENT
